title: One Week Left to Register for the OCE LOL CUP! (Now with Triumphant Ryze)
body:
Hey guys!

So if you haven't heard Oceanic LOL is running a 5v5 tournament! Here's what you need to know. 

**Prize Pool** (+ recently added prizes thanks to Riot!)
PRIZES:
1st place team - $500 of RP for the team + 3200 RP & Triumphant Ryze skin for every player
2nd place team - $250 of RP + 2400 RP per player
3rd place team - $125 of RP + 1600 RP per player
4th place team - $50 of RP + 800 RP per player

**How and When**
The competition will begin with the Group Stages. Teams will be split into 4 groups and compete in a round robin style competition. These games will be played on the weekends between Saturday 10am AEST and Sunday 4pm AEST. The group stages will conclude after 3 weeks. Out of a maximum of (24) teams, only (8) will advance.

ROUND 1 - 2nd & 3rd of May, 2015
ROUND 2 - 9th of May 2015
ROUND 3 - 10th of May 2015
ROUND 4 - 16th of May 2015
ROUND 5 - 17th of May 2015

The Playoffs will take place on the 4th week, with a Double-Elimination format being played over the weekend and a best-of-3 Final to be played on Sunday night at 6pm AEST.

TOP 8 DOUBLE ELIMINATION: Broadcasted Live on twitch.tv/OceanicLol
Saturday 23rd of May 2015
Sunday 24th of May 2015

**Registration Requirements **
Entry Requirements
• You must be level 30
• You must have a League of Legends account on the Oceania Region
• $25 Team Entry – This is to prevent time-wasters
• A maximum of 7 players can be registered to a team – Any changes to the roster must be approved by an Oceanic LoL Cup admin.
• Players must have a Facebook account and be a member of the Oceanic LoL Facebook group
www.facebook.com/groups/OceanicLoL
To register your team send the following information to OceanicLoLCup@gmail.com
• Team Name (3 to 24 characters)
• Player IGN’s (min 5 max 7) *Note: Changes to your roster after registration must be approved by an Oceanic LoL Cup admin.*
• Player Facebook Profiles – To check if players are members of Oceanic LoL
• Team Captain
• Team Captain Email

**TO ENTER!**
Send you details through to oceaniclolcup@gmail.com
If you would like join a team for the tournament please add me at Skyprus and I'll help you find a team :D

replies.body: Looking for 4 members plat+ for team register. Will pay joining fee by myself, hit me up!

im a support main, i got an adc and mid laner all plat+ if you want.

What roles do you prefer?
Hey awesome, I'll try working out some teams tonight.
There are less than 10 spots left. Send your teams details to OceanicLoLCup@gmail.com to secure a spot today!
top main, if anyone needs me :p {{champion:80}}
